Sentencas: A new combined system model is proposed to numerically assess the feasibility and effectiveness of using a thermophotovoltaic cell (TPVC) for waste heat recovery from a direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell (DC-SOFC).
Titulo: Numerical modeling of a cogeneration system based on a direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell and a thermophotovoltaic cell

Sentencas: The system model mainly consists of an irreversible TPVC model and a 2D tubular DC-SOFC model considering the ionic/electronic charge transport, mass transport, momentum transport, and chemical/electrochemical reactions.
Titulo: Numerical modeling of a cogeneration system based on a direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell and a thermophotovoltaic cell

Sentencas: Mathematical expressions of the power density and efficiency for the proposed system are derived and the performance characteristics of the combined system are revealed.
Titulo: Numerical modeling of a cogeneration system based on a direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell and a thermophotovoltaic cell

Sentencas: The impacts of operation conditions and designing parameters including the operating temperature of the DC-SOFC, distance between the carbon layer and anode, and band-gap energy of the TPVC on the combined system performance are examined.
Titulo: Numerical modeling of a cogeneration system based on a direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell and a thermophotovoltaic cell

Sentencas: It is found that the TPVC can efficiently harvest the waste heat from the DC-SOFC.
Titulo: Numerical modeling of a cogeneration system based on a direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell and a thermophotovoltaic cell

Sentencas: The maximum power density of the combined system is approximately 56.2% larger than that of the stand-alone DC-SOFC.
Titulo: Numerical modeling of a cogeneration system based on a direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell and a thermophotovoltaic cell

Sentencas: Moreover, a higher operating temperature of the DC-SOFC and a smaller distance between the carbon layer and the anode are beneficial to the performance enhancement of the combined system.
Titulo: Numerical modeling of a cogeneration system based on a direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell and a thermophotovoltaic cell

Sentencas: The power density of the combined system can be further improved through designing the TPVC with an optimum band gap.
Titulo: Numerical modeling of a cogeneration system based on a direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell and a thermophotovoltaic cell
